UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: "Specificity Determinants" Improve Therapeutic Indices of Two Antimicrobial Peptides Piscidin 1 and Dermaseptin S4 Against the Gram-negative Pathogens Acinetobacter baumannii and Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
Literature.Author: Jiang Z, Vasil AI, Vasil ML, Hodges RS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=3.0µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=3.0µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 649(MIC=3.0µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 689(MIC=1.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 1012(MIC=6.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=24.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAK(MIC=12.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=24.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CP204(MIC=24.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M2(MIC=24.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa WR5(MIC=12.2µM)
